name: Frog&Bajs
description:
Frog&Bajs is a humorous  parody game about internet and twitch memes. It is designed to be 2D  souls like action/adventure game with elements of RPG. It focuses on die-try again-get better gameplay loop. This is the demo version, containing only first level. A game is still in deep development process.

 It is mainly aimed at Forsen community but anyone can play and enjoy it!

The game is about  memes, streamers, viewers and everything we love on Twitch.tv. Must play for every streamer to experience it together with their communities. Everybody likes good content on twitch, right? I'm creating this game and want to make it the best for you! But to fully achieve this goal I need time and your help, together we can create something great, that everyone can enjoy.

Disclaimer:

With the game being a parody I do not claim ownership over any asset used in the game as it is not created for personal profit!

Before you download!

Demo is spoiler free, contains only first area so no major events or plot points.

Although save system is implemented it's still kind of scuffed and rarely breaks so it is preferred to play the whole thing in one go. Average game time: 2-3h.

If you want smooth experience, don't try to break stuff because you will! If you want to help with bug fixing go ahead! Remeber to report bugs in thread below.

Be especially careful with inventory, do everything slowly and accurately!

Playing in 1080p, fullscreen and best quality preferred!

Enjoy!
